Summary1: This all suite hotel is impeccable, especially during the holiday season, when it is decorated with festive Christmas lights and palm trees. Its location is ideal for making the most of the peace and quiet, close to the beach and just a short shuttle ride away from the airport and Duval street -- though downtown is quite a trek. The rooms are modern with ample storage space and the beds are incredibly comfortable. The bathrooms are rather roomy too with a nice vanity area and the staff is accommodating, even to last minute requests for late check-out. The restaurant offers delicious food, though it closes quite early. The hotel even provides bikes for hire! However, nearby parking can be quite expensive for daily use. The elevators can feel a bit unsafe.
Sentence2: This all suite hotel is flawless.

Summary1: This condo was an incredible experience - comfortable, convenient, and much more pleasant than a hotel. It would be regrettable not to come back again, especially due to how perfectly the hotel rests beside the lake, with the possibility of renting boats from Indian Point. The sights were remarkable, and to top it off the staff at the hotel were beyond friendly. The units overlooking the lake had big patios suitable for enjoying a cup of coffee. The only negative was the people staying in the room on the upper floor who were loudly up all night, but that was the sole downside to this fabulous condo.
Sentence2: This is a great condo that was comfortable, convenient, and much nicer than staying in a hotel.

Summary1: This hotel has a one-of-a-kind feel to it and is situated in a convenient area, despite not having a subway near by. Shopping centers and theaters are just a few blocks away, enhancing its location. The bathroom features cutting-edge features, and most of the staff were hospitable. The in-house eatery offers outstanding food made with locally sourced, organic ingredients. Added to that, the old-fashioned elevator provides an interesting experience.
Sentence2: Overall the hotel is a really unique place to stay.

Summary1: Many people are divided on their opinion of the hotel, yet it remains in a convenient position for buses on the St. Charles line, as well as being close to the Garden District and a bit farther from the French Quarter. The rooms are roomy, with a kitchen included and kept nicely clean, with the exception of somewhat small bathrooms. The showers, however, were fantastic. Summary1: This hotel provides a delightful and delightful stay. If you come back to Venice, you would not want to stay in any other place. It is ideally located to access some wonderful restaurants and it's in close proximity to water transportation stops. The accommodation in the hotel presented a nicely decorated bathroom, and an ambient room. The decorations respected the historical heritage. The morning meal wasn't extravagant yet it still allowed a nice start to the day with continental yogurt, cereal, and more. The hotel provides guests with amazing value for the cost they pay.
Sentence2: This hotel makes for a really pleasant and delightful stay.

Summary1: The hotel is situated in a peaceful canal street, conveniently close enough by to walk to lots of historic sights like the Dam Square and Anne Franks House. The room itself was rather tiny but it afforded you a fantastic view of the canal. It would be best to book a bigger room, though the small room had a surprisingly large bathroom. The personnel at the reception desk and breakfast room were not at all friendly and their service was quite appalling. Despite its low cost, the breakfast selection was sparse and the food not up to very much.
Sentence2: The hotel is nicely located in a quiet canal street with being only walkable distance to many interesting places like Dam Square and Anne Franks House.

Summary1: Highly recommended to anyone. This well-kept hotel feature great amenities, comfortable but luxurious vibes, and a wonderful courtyard and pool. It is in just the right location and a short walk to all the main attractions. The rooms are spotless and the mattress is incredibly comfortable. The only issue was the shower, which had some leakage outside the cubicle. The service was generally excellent; the staff here are both accommodating and professional. There were a few minor hiccups, such as the cleaning staff not functioning after 12am. Additionally, the hotel had wonderful chocolates and germsnaps in the lobby and free breakfast. The pool area was great. Valet parking should be an available service.
Sentence2: Really recommended to anyone.

Summary1: It is strongly recommended to check out this well-kept hotel that provides magnificent amenities, a relaxed yet upscale atmosphere, and a stunning courtyard and pool. There were minimal glitches like the cleaning crew not being accessible after midnight. In addition, the lobby had complimentary chocolate and german cookies and a continental breakfast. The pool area was amazing. It would be helpful to have a valet parking service.

Summary1: This hotel is a great option for the younger and more spirited crowd, such as a girl's trip. It is conveniently located near bus stops into the city centre and offers views and proximity to a number of restaurants and activities in Lincoln Park. Clark Street, which is within walking distance of the hotel, is also a consumer's paradise. The single bedrooms come with two beds, making them suitable for one or two people, and the cleanliness of the rooms, apart from some drain problems in the showers, was top notch. There are also two important amenities for guests at this hotel- a hearty breakfast, and reliable security which requires the use of a key card to enter into certain elevators and stairwells. Plus, the WiFi is free! The only thing worth noting is the limited parking availability, as well as some street noise, but it's minor enough to be barely noticeable.
Sentence2: The hotel is ideal for a boisterous and young crowd, such as a girl's trip.

Every morning, visitors could feast on a complimentary breakfast spread and hot beverages for the entire day - a great option for groups. Within short walking distance, Rock Bottom Brewery let out sensational meals. If arrival was earlier than expected, the hotel could also provide early check-in, which was a considerate gesture.
Sentence2: The wheelchair accessible bathroom, complete with a bathtub, was a nice touch.

Summary1: This hotel has all the updated amenities, but is decorated in a traditional fashion. It is incredibly quick and easy to get to the downtown area, making it an ideal choice for location. The rooms are very grand and tranquil, including comfortable beds and fireplaces. The showers were remarkable, however the walls were quite thin. In addition, it offers car service. Not only was the cuisine scrumptious but all dishes were delectable. Unfortunately, the sink faucets were quite stiff and since it is an older structure, there was no soundproofing.
Sentence2: The hotel has all the modern conveniences but is set out in a classical style.

Summary1: This hotel was overall really great, but a bit expensive. If you stay on the front side, the horns from the street might be bothersome. The location was very central, so you could walk to attractions like Gaudi's Casa Batllo and La Pedrera. The metro was also close by. The standard room was smaller than anticipated, and the bed took up a lot of the space, but it was comfortable. The bathrooms need some updating, and the room service was costly. The breakfast was not worth the money. The lifts were slow and waiting long periods of time was common since there were only two of them. Staying in a room that faces the courtyard at the back of the hotel ensures more quietness than those at the front.
Sentence2: This is overall a really great hotel but a bit pricey.

The standard room was smaller than anticipated, and the bed took up a lot of the space, but it was comfortable. The bathrooms need some updating, and the room service was costly. The breakfast was not worth the money. The lifts were slow and waiting long periods of time was common since there were only two of them. Staying in a room that faces the courtyard at the back of the hotel ensures more quietness than those at the front.
Sentence2: The standard space was not as big as expected, and the bed filled up a big part of the area, but it was very comfortable.

Summary1: The hotel had a spa and pools that provided a relaxing atmosphere during the stay. In addition to the cleanliness of the property, the figures made of ice were a delightful surprise. Its location made it easy to enjoy the local restaurants, bars and wildlife nearby. The room was sizable with a flat-screen high-definition television, and all toiletries were made readily available upon request. Unfortunately, the food prices were quite expensive and could be improved. Nevertheless, the vibrant atria were breathtaking with a variety of wildlife to view.
Sentence2: The hotel had a spa and pools that made it a relaxing time during the stay.

Summary1: This hotel is located conveniently near restaurants, the river and shops, making it a great place to rent out for a conference or corporate event. The rooms are roomy and nicely outfitted. The bathrooms are especially large, some with bathtubs, and small amenities like a chocolate on the pillow make it feel especially homey. For refreshment, there is a roof terrace bar. The only downside is the lack of a pool.
Sentence2: The hotel has conference rooms available to rent out for conferences and corporate events.

Summary1: The hotel has a homely atmosphere, but it can be missing small, personalized touches. It is conveniently connected to a subway station and sits above the Pacific Place shopping mall, but getting to the business district may be a longer jouney. The rooms are modern, though their size and decoration can be lacking. The cafe provides lunch, but at a hefty price and the food has been known to be a bit underwhelming. The hotel's saving grace lies in its many facilities, such as a gym and pool.
Sentence2: The hotel has a level of homely comfort, but sometimes lack small personal touches, The hotel is connected to a subway and sits above the Pacific Place shopping mall., however it can take a while to travel to the business district.

It is conveniently connected to a subway station and sits above the Pacific Place shopping mall, but getting to the business district may be a longer jouney. The rooms are modern, though their size and decoration can be lacking. The cafe provides lunch, but at a hefty price and the food has been known to be a bit underwhelming. The hotel's saving grace lies in its many facilities, such as a gym and pool.
Sentence2: It is conveniently located near the subway station, and is situated over the Pacific Place mall.

Summary1: The accommodation was spotless and affordably priced. It definitely needs some modernising, but if the costs were reduced, it would almost certainly be enhanced. The area the hotel is situated in is great - nearby to lots of shops, cafes and a conference centre. The bedrooms in the hotel are spacious and tidy with any requirement for comfort stored in the suite. The bedding was so comfortable and offered a wonderful night’s sleep. Although, the hotel is a bit outdated and in need of some renovations. The breakfast provided is expensive, the remainder of their food selection is top notch. Guests can avail of the swimming pool for a considerable amount of time. Although the parking can be quite pricey, the hotel willing to help out.
Sentence2: The hotel was clean and reasonably priced.

The hotel is a little bit outdated and in need of a bit of an upgrade though. The hotel had an expensive breakfast however overall the food is great. The pool at the hotel is open for a good amount of time for guests. There is also parking available which is a bit expensive, but the hotel can help out with it.
Sentence2: The bedding was incredibly comfortable and enabled for a great night's sleep.

Summary1: This beloved hotel is very well-maintained and cozy. There is a variety of shops and eateries nearby, so the lodging is in an exceptional spot. Moreover, there are various attractions like a theater and cathedral within walking distance. From the grand guest room, one had a stunning view of the courtyard when the sun was shining. Moreover, four people could also stay comfortably in one room, and every space was exceptionally clean. There was a doorman who was always ready to greet visitors, as well as a warm and affable staff. Guests could enjoy a vast selection of scrumptious fare with their morning meal in the buffet. There is also an outdoor dining area suitable for lunch. Top-notch toiletries were available at the hotel, and the rates were quite reasonable given how delightful and sophisticated the hotel is.
Sentence2: This greatly loved hotel is well kept and comfortable.

Summary1: This hotel offers amazing safety and is a preferred option from customers. Due to its proximity to the metro line and Rembrandt Square, the hotel is tucked away from the busiest of tourist spots. Despite being relatively small, the room proved to be both clean and modern. To make it even better, it was wheelchair-friendly, even if there was no shower curtain meaning that the bathroom got wet. The staff however, were not particularly helpful to visitors. The seafood bistro offers a wide variety of amazing food. The wifi in the hotel lobby was terribly slow and the carpet was unclean. Unfortunately, the exterior was overcrowded and quite noisy.
Sentence2: The hotel is great and provides a safe place to stay.

Summary1: This accommodation has an exceptional focus on safety and is favored among customers. Located not far from the metro line and Rembrandt Square, the hotel is secluded from the more populated parts of town. Although on the tiny side, the room was impeccable and contemporary. Wheelchair-accessibility was an added bonus, although showers were not fitted with curtains which resulted in a damp bathroom. The personnel wasn't particularly supportive to customers. As for the seafood restaurant, their selection of dishes was tremendous. Internet connection in the lobby was exceptionally sluggish and carpets needed to be cleaned. A problem was the crowded noise outside the building.
Sentence2: The hotel is great and provides a safe place to stay.

Summary1: This hotel was really nice in its own right, even though it wasn't an extravagant resort. Plenty of entertaining things can be found nearby for those looking for something to do. The guest rooms, though not large, were orderly with vintage decorations for a classical vibe. Breakfast options were acceptable, though accompanied by some shortcomings. The coffee, however, was quite tasty, as well as the whole atmosphere was quite run-down, with aged ornamentations and carpets. Furthermore, the elevators were not very spacious and were unable to even fit a surfboard.
Sentence2: This is a really great little hotel.

Summary1: The hotel is a peaceful and tidy place to spend time in Rome, and conveniently close to some dining spots and the buzzing parts of town. The rooms are suitable, with large bathrooms, and each evening a chocolate is left on the bed for all of the guests. The morning buffet was great, though the hallways are rather unadorned and could use a touch of decoration. The complimentary wireless was strong, and the Bulgari toiletries fragrances were delightful.
Sentence2: The hotel is tranquil and clean and overall an enjoyable place to stay whilst in Rome.

Summary1: This hotel is an enjoyable place to stay, thanks to its excellent facilities. Unfortunately, the location isn't the best and the scenery isn't so great. The guest rooms are decent, but could use a bit more brightness. They are still clean and peaceful, however, and if you'd like the most modern accommodation you should book the Club floor. The hospitality of the staff could not be faulted - they go out of their way to help. The breakfast buffet is delightful and varied, and the restaurant also offers some tasty food. If you need to go somewhere, there's a bus shuttle with departures every two hours that's free for guests. Lastly, while a pool would be nice, it's not the most practical addition given the local climate.
Sentence2: The facilities of this hotel are really great and therefore it's one of the most enjoyable stays.

Summary1: This hotel is an absolute must-visit. Only a stone's throw away from the beach, the Port Olympic and Barcelonetta, this five-star establishment is sure to make you want to come back again. Boasting a stunning rooftop pool with a view of the sea, a fitness park two minutes away and a top-notch Jacuzzi on the rooftop, its features add to the overall star-rated experience. While the room had an excellent bathroom, its pillows and linen were a bit uncomfortable. The bed was great and there was plenty of space in the room and it was clean, with a sea view to top it off. The food here was really good too, particularly the breakfast, and if the restaurant wasn't open for dinner, the chef was flexible for small groups.
Sentence2: Highly recommended hotel that you will want to come back to because it is definitely five-star.

Summary1: This hotel is a definite spot you don't want to miss! Just a short distance away from the Port Olympic, the Barcelonetta and the ocean, it is a five-star destination that will definitely keep you coming back. Delight in the beautiful ocean view from the rooftop pool, indulge in the Jacuzzi, and break a sweat at the nearby fitness park. The restroom was especially impressive, though unfortunately, the bedding and pillows were not as comfortable as expected. The room also had plenty of floor space and a stunning seaside view. To complete the satisfaction, the meals here were excellent, especially the breakfast, although the restaurant could not open for dinner, the chef was still willing to cater to smaller groups.
Sentence2: Highly recommended hotel that you will want to come back to because it is definitely five-star.

Summary1: I would certainly recommend this hotel and would be happy to stay there again. Located in the old quarter of Istanbul, it was mere minutes away from attractions such as the Blue Mosque, the Grand Bazaar, and other places of interest and historical sites in Sultanahmet. Although the rooms are small, they are kept clean and comfortable. Moreover, the staff had extensive knowledge of the local area. Additionally, the breakfast was truly remarkable and served on an outdoor terrace. Aside from this, free internet access was offered at the reception. All in all, I cannot find one thing to dislike about this hotel.
Sentence2: It's a good hotel and would definitely recommend as well as return for another stay.

Sentence2: Appallingly, the water quality was poor, being clouded and containing seaweed.

Summary1: This beautiful, charming hotel may be busy during the month of September as it is in a tranquil area as well as near many of Venice's best attractions. Although the rooms were clean, they have more of a dormitory feel so you would have to spend an extra €20 to get an upgrade. The owners are very hospitable and the morning meal is simple, but the breakfast area is particularly small so it gets filled up quickly. However, there are nearby cafes and the staff will even make reservations for you. The boat trip to Murano is worth it, although it is suggested to go with the normal boat.
Sentence2: This lovely and charming hotel can be busy during September time.

The buffet breakfasts and dinners in this hotel is absolutely superb and there is even an a la carte lunch option. If that wasn't enough there is a great bar on the ground floor with really good tasty food, too. The internet provided at the hotel was of poor quality because it was so unreliable and you had to put a down-payment just to connect. However, there is a pool here at the hotel and that's really clean and of good quality.
Sentence2: There is also a dependable bar with delicious dishes at the ground level.

Summary1: The accommodations at this hotel are a bit out of date and could use a refresh, but it was very clean. It has a great central location near public transit, Clarke Quay and the National Museum. The bed was comfortable and the full bath was a nice touch. However, soundproofing is poor, so noises from the elevator and from neighbors were very audible. Additionally, there is a lack of aesthetic style and no wifi in the rooms. The breakfast does not meet expectations with a limited number of choices and nothing fresh. It does however have a small pool.
Sentence2: The hotel's furnishings is a bit outdated and need updating but it was very clean.

Shopping and tourist attractions are within walking distance, and Darling Harbour is close by. The corner-room was of a decent size and very clean. An earlier check-in can be organised with request. The staff were generally quite friendly, but there were occasions when they seemed to be disinterested. The Continental breakfast was provided by the hotel, however some issues occurred with people not being on the necessary list. The hotel's restaurant was good quality but costlier than expected. The hotel staff were able to provide helpful pre-booking information, although getting checked out was laborious and frustrating.
Sentence2: Walking-distance to shopping, sightseeing, and Darling Harbour.

The moderate-sized rooms are tidy and offer tasteful decorations. They also sustain some of the past banking heritage. There is unhindered WiFi with decorative, contemporary art pieces decorating the walls. The bar is admirable for soothing tunes and to linger over a drink. The hotel is surprisingly silent and on Fridays and Saturdays, visitors can enjoy live music in the bar area.

Summary1: This hotel is a steal and definitely worth the recommendation. It is situated in the middle of the tourist district, so everything is within an easy walk. The rooms are nice, tidy, and reasonably priced with deluxe rooms having a balcony facing 5th Avenue. The staff are incredibly helpful and can tell you about the best attractions and can help for transportation to the airport, which is a nice extra. Lastly, Rancho Punto Venado is located conveniently, where you can experience all sorts of outdoors activities such as horseback riding and ATV driving.
Sentence2: The hotel was a bargain and comes highly recommended.

Summary1: Staying at the hotel is a highly recommended experience, blending modern and traditional elements throughout. It is conveniently located near the Grand Canal, just a short ride away from San Marco Square and near to the Salute Church. Additionally, art galleries and the Vaporetto are also in close proximity. Rooms overlooking the canal are neat and tidy. The food selection is straightforward and can be served anywhere at the hotel. Plus, the minibar is always fully-stocked. The cost for the hotel may seem a bit pricey, but it does manage to be worth it in the end.
Sentence2: The hotel was a unique experience with traditional and modern features.

The staff were immensely knowledgeable about the restaurants in the area and nearby side trips, which was extremely helpful. I was so pleased with my experience at this lodging - it was incredibly comfortable and the concert hall next door playing classical music was a great bonus. Its location was fantastic - nestled in a peaceful neighborhood but still close to the major sights of the city, plus the metro and tour bus stops. The room was spotless and large, with a freshly updated restroom. The staff had comprehensive knowledge of all the local restaurants and day trips, so helpful! My breakfast selection was outstanding, with delicious continental treats, and they were even kind enough to let me take away the rest. The only thing that was missing was a complete fitness center.
Sentence2: It was such a comfortable experience here at this hotel and nice bonus there was classical music that came from a nearby opera school.

I was so pleased with my experience at this lodging - it was incredibly comfortable and the concert hall next door playing classical music was a great bonus. Its location was fantastic - nestled in a peaceful neighborhood but still close to the major sights of the city, plus the metro and tour bus stops. The room was spotless and large, with a freshly updated restroom. The staff had comprehensive knowledge of all the local restaurants and day trips, so helpful! My breakfast selection was outstanding, with delicious continental treats, and they were even kind enough to let me take away the rest. The only thing that was missing was a complete fitness center.
